sqlMap.select: SELECT RTM.REPORT_TYPE_MASTER_ID,RTM.REPORT_TYPE from CMS_REPORT_TYPE_MASTER rtm WHERE RTM.REPORT_TYPE_MASTER_ID NOT IN(SELECT RPM.REPORT_TYPE_ID FROM RG_REPORT_PASSWORD_MASTER rpm where rpm.status=1)and rtm.status = 1 order by rtm.report_type
SELECT unique RTM.REPORT_TYPE_MASTER_ID,RTM.REPORT_TYPE from CMS_REPORT_TYPE_MASTER rtm,RG_REPORT_PASSWORD_MASTER rpm where rtm.REPORT_TYPE_MASTER_ID = rpm.REPORT_TYPE_ID order by rtm.report_type
